entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Beach
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
